de.iss.mv2.server.io

Class ServerBindingsConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.server.io.ServerBindingsConfiguration

  • public class ServerBindingsConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    A configuration file for the bindings of a server.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer

      • toServerBindings

        public ServerBindings toServerBindings(java.lang.String passphrase)
                                throws java.security.cert.CertificateException,
                                       java.io.IOException,
                                       org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException,
                                       org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCSException
        Tries to read all certificates and keys and returns the server bindings.
        Parameters:
        passphrase - The passphrase of the encrypted key files.
        Returns:
        The read bindings.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs. Especially if the certificate or key file was not found.
        java.security.cert.CertificateException - If the certificate can not be read.
        org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCSException - If the key can not be read or the supplied passphrase is incorrect.
        org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException - If the operator is invalid.

      • read

        public void read(java.io.InputStream in)
        Reads the server bindings from the given input stream.
        Parameters:
        in - The input stream to read.

        public void read(java.io.File file)
          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Reads the server bindings from the given input stream.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to read.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the given file was not found.

      • write

        public void write(java.io.OutputStream out)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the server bindings to the given input stream and closes it.
        Parameters:
        out - The output stream to write to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

      • write

        public void write(java.io.File file)
           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                  java.io.IOException
        Writes the server bindings to the given file.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to write to.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the given file does not exist and can not be created.
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

      • addBinding

        public void addBinding(java.lang.String binding,
                       java.lang.String certificatePath,
                       java.lang.String keyPath)
        Adds a binding to this configuration.
        Parameters:
        binding - The binding to add.
        certificatePath - The path to the connected certificate.
        keyPath - The path to the connected private key file.
